A Man, a Plan, a Blog…

This is the personal blog of Kevin Werbach. I've been studying how networked technologies transform business and society since the early 1990s. I'm a professor at the University of Pennsylvania's Wharton School, policy wonk, connector, dad, gamer, and various other things. Thanks for stopping by.
